bib.title: Diagnostic tools in plWordNet development process
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej and Burdka, {\L}ukasz and Maziarz, Marek and Kali{\'n}ski, Micha{\l}
bib.abstract: With the growing size of a wordnet, it is becoming more and more difficult to avoid, identify and eliminate errors in it, especially when a group of editors work in parallel. That is the case of plWordNet. Thus we need elaborated tools for both error prevention during editing, and diagnostic tools for error detection after the work was completed. In this paper, first, we present error prevention mechanisms built-in the plWordNet editor application and the system for group-working of a linguistic team. Next, we discuss diagnostic tests and
